title: 55 Loops Part: 3 Simple
description: 55 HQ Recorded from professional music workstation for Science Fiction, Sci-fi, Thriller, Mystic, Adventure, RPG, Platformer.
longDescription:
The third part of the collection of seamless loops, consisting of 55 sound files. You will find several options that will help you make musical continuations. The provided loops can be used not only as music, but also as a level ambience, movie scenes or sound effects.


Genre: Science Fiction, Sci-fi, Thriller, Mystic, Adventure, RPG, Platformer.


Samples: https://soundeffects.store/product/loops-55-part-3-simple/

Support: https://discord.gg/GGbSmHr


*The original sound files are clean and of excellent quality. Preview sample has sound watermark (ambient noise).

*Youtube samples have downgraded audio quality (160kbps). Original files have (1411kbps)
technicalDetails:
Features:


  • Longest loop 41 sec. Shortest loop 2 sec.
  • Some loops have variations.
  • All loops are seamless.
  • Cheaper then other parts.
  • Hight - Quallity.


Number of Audio Wavs: 55

Number of Audio Cues: 55

Sample rate / bit rate: 44.1 kHz, 16bit Stereo WAVs

Does music loop: Yes

Minutes of audio provided: 00:08:29

Supported Development Platforms: All Platforms

Supported Target Build Platforms: All Platforms

Documentation: Discord

Important/Additional Notes: Please stay in touch and tell us about your game - marketplace@soundeffects.store
